org.ants.jndd.cache

类 OperationCache<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ants.jndd.cache.OperationCache<T>

  • public class OperationCache<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Operation cache of NDD.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      (专用程序包) java.lang.Object[] cache
      The cache.
      (专用程序包) int cacheSize
      The max number of entries in the cache.
      (专用程序包) int entrySize
      The length of each entry. 3 for binary operations and 2 for unary operations.
      int hashValue
      Store the hash value of getEntry() temporarily, if the entry is not found.
      T result
      Store the result of getEntry() temporarily, if the entry is found.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      OperationCache(int cacheSize, int entrySize)
      Construct function of operation cache.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void clearCache()
      Invalidate all the entries in the cache.
      boolean getEntry(T operand1)
      Get the result of operation(operand1).
      boolean getEntry(T operand1, T operand2)
      Get the result of operation(operand1, operand2).
      void setEntry(int index, T operand1, T result)
      Insert new entry of (operand1, result) into cache.
      void setEntry(int index, T operand1, T operand2, T result)
      Insert new entry of (operand1, operand2, result) into cache.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 字段详细资料

      • cacheSize

        int cacheSize
        The max number of entries in the cache.

      • entrySize

        int entrySize
        The length of each entry. 3 for binary operations and 2 for unary operations.

      • cache

        java.lang.Object[] cache
        The cache.

      • result

        public T result
        Store the result of getEntry() temporarily, if the entry is found.

      • hashValue

        public int hashValue
        Store the hash value of getEntry() temporarily, if the entry is not found.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • OperationCache

        public OperationCache(int cacheSize,
                      int entrySize)
        Construct function of operation cache.
        参数:
        cacheSize - The max number of entries in the cache
        entrySize - The length of each entry. 3 for binary operations and 2 for unary operations.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setEntry

        public void setEntry(int index,
                     T operand1,
                     T result)
        Insert new entry of (operand1, result) into cache. Directly overwrite the old value if there exist a hash collision.
        参数:
        index - The index of the entry to be inserted, which is actually a hash value.
        operand1 - The only operand of a unary operation.
        result - The result of the operation.

      • setEntry

        public void setEntry(int index,
                     T operand1,
                     T operand2,
                     T result)
        Insert new entry of (operand1, operand2, result) into cache. Directly overwrite the old value if there exist a hash collision.
        参数:
        index - The index of the entry to be inserted, which is actually a hash value.
        operand1 - The first operand of a binary operation.
        operand2 - The second operand of a binary operation.
        result - The result of the operation.

      • getEntry

        public boolean getEntry(T operand1)
        Get the result of operation(operand1).
        参数:
        operand1 - The only operand of a unary operation.
        返回:
        TRUE if the entry found (the result will be stored in this.result), FALSE if the entry not found (the hashValue will be stored in this.hashValue).

      • getEntry

        public boolean getEntry(T operand1,
                        T operand2)
        Get the result of operation(operand1, operand2).
        参数:
        operand1 - The first operand of a binary operation.
        operand2 - The second operand of a binary operation.
        返回:
        TRUE if the entry found (the result will be stored in this.result), FALSE if the entry not found (the hashValue will be stored in this.hashValue).

      • clearCache

        public void clearCache()
        Invalidate all the entries in the cache.
